cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.utils

Interface CredentialStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileCredentialStore, SecureFileCredentialStore

    public interface CredentialStore
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.utils/CredentialStore.java

    Basic interface of the credential store. It is recommended to implement a custom credential store as a singleton and pass it along to each of OAuth2 instances.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jaromír Staněk

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteCredential(java.lang.String identifier)
      Remove existing OAuth2Token from the store.
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getIdentifiers()
      Retrieves all the identifiers used in the store.
      java.util.Collection<OAuth2Token> getTokens()
      Retrieves all the tokens from the store.
      java.util.Set<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,OAuth2Token>> retrieveAllCredentials()
      Retrieves all the credentials stored in the store.
      OAuth2Token retrieveCredential(java.lang.String identifier)
      Returns OAuth2Token from the store identified by identifier.
      java.lang.String storeCredential(OAuth2Token token)
      Save new OAuth2Token into the store.
      java.lang.String storeCredential(java.lang.String identifier, OAuth2Token token)
      Update existing OAuth2Token or save it with custom identifier.

    • Method Detail

      • deleteCredential

        void deleteCredential(java.lang.String identifier)
        Remove existing OAuth2Token from the store.
        Parameters:
        identifier - Identifier if the token in the store.

      • getIdentifiers

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getIdentifiers()
        Retrieves all the identifiers used in the store.
        Returns:
        Set of all identifiers.

      • getTokens

        java.util.Collection<OAuth2Token> getTokens()
        Retrieves all the tokens from the store.
        Returns:
        Collection of all the tokens.

      • retrieveAllCredentials

        java.util.Set<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,OAuth2Token>> retrieveAllCredentials()
        Retrieves all the credentials stored in the store.
        Returns:
        Set of all identifier - token pairs.

      • retrieveCredential

        OAuth2Token retrieveCredential(java.lang.String identifier)
        Returns OAuth2Token from the store identified by identifier.
        Parameters:
        identifier - Identifier of the token in the store.
        Returns:
        Returns the token, if it exists. If not, null is returned.

      • storeCredential

        java.lang.String storeCredential(OAuth2Token token)
        Save new OAuth2Token into the store.
        Parameters:
        token - Token to be saved.
        Returns:
        Assigned identifier.

      • storeCredential

        java.lang.String storeCredential(java.lang.String identifier,
                               OAuth2Token token)
        Update existing OAuth2Token or save it with custom identifier.
        Parameters:
        identifier - Identifier of the token in the store.
        token - Token to be saved.
        Returns:
        Assigned identifier, if the supplied one wasn't valid.
